tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: Each warning may be displayed in more than one node when the action taken by the trading bot affects multiple nodes.

paragraphs.text: In other words, warnings are displayed in affected nodes, which may be many for any given warning. We'll work with a few examples in a minute!
In fact, let's look into each warning, one by one!
We're going to take a little detour to explore warnings further. They are a great tool to understand what the trading bot does and how!
